table.name: volunteerheroProject
table.desc: Describes the volunteerhero project year for data correlation and to store unique information to each year.

field.name: res_notes
field.constraint: , UNIQUE (res_projid, res_firstname, res_lastname) , FOREIGN KEY (res_projid) REFERENCES volunteerheroProject(project_id)

field.name: job_valuename
field.desc: References additional data to main resident job. Use same value as name with valuetype=checkbox to reference main enable value for sub values under name

field.name: job_valuetype
field.desc: Datatype for additional data field. Possible Values: radio, text, checkbox, textarea, select

field.name: job_valueoptions
field.desc: Leave NULL for text fields. Use comma delimitted list for radio and select

field.name: job_valuedefault
field.desc: Use value from list for radio, checkbox, and select. Use default text for text fields. Leave NULL for first value in list or blank text field

field.name: job_enabled
field.desc: If job should appear in form

field.name: resjob_value
field.desc: If the Job valueoptions is not NULL, the value must be within the given list
field.constraint: , PRIMARY KEY(resjob_jobid, resjob_resid) , FOREIGN KEY(resjob_jobid) REFERENCES volunteerheroJobTasks(job_id) , FOREIGN KEY(resjob_resid) REFERENCES volunteerheroResidents(res_id)

field.name: volgrp_created
field.constraint: , PRIMARY KEY(volgrp_id) , UNIQUE(volgrp_name, volgrp_projid) , FOREIGN KEY(volgrp_projid) REFERENCES volunteerheroProject(project_id) , FOREIGN KEY(volgrp_creator) REFERENCES Users(uID)

field.name: regvol_checkedin
field.constraint: , PRIMARY KEY(regvol_id) , FOREIGN KEY(regvol_grpid) REFERENCES volunteerheroVolunteerGroup(volgrp_id) , FOREIGN KEY(regvol_projid) REFERENCES volunteerheroProject(project_id) , FOREIGN KEY(regvol_uid) REFERENCES Users(uID) , UNIQUE(regvol_projid, regvol_uid)

field.name: drv_numofseats
field.desc: Total number of seats in vehicle (including driver)

field.name: wrkgrp_status
field.desc: Status of group, 0-Not Ready, 1-OK to release, 3-Released
field.constraint: , PRIMARY KEY(wrkgrp_id) , UNIQUE(wrkgrp_projid, wrkgrp_name) , FOREIGN KEY(wrkgrp_projid) REFERENCES volunteerheroProject(project_id)

field.name: wrkasn_wrkid
field.constraint: , PRIMARY KEY(wrkasn_id) , UNIQUE(wrkasn_volid, wrkasn_wrkid) , FOREIGN KEY(wrkasn_volid) REFERENCES volunteerheroRegisteredVolunteer(regvol_id) , FOREIGN KEY(wrkasn_wrkid) REFERENCES volunteerheroWorkGroup(wrkgrp_id)
